history.proof: intros. unfold SF_cut_up. simpl. unfold seq_cut_up. destruct h as [h1 h2]. destruct ptd as [ptd1 ptd2]. unfold fst, snd. destruct H as [H1 H2]. destruct (Rle_dec h1 x) as [case_le | case_gt]. - simpl. shelve. - simpl. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
h: (R * R)%type
ptd: SF_seq
x: R

Goal:
fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_up (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (x, Rmax (snd h) x) ptd

Premises:
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _]
SF_h = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => let (SF_h, _) := s in SF_h : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
SF_cons = fun (T : Type) (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := fst h; SF_t := (SF_h s, snd h) :: SF_t s |} : forall T : Type, R * T -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _]
SF_cut_up = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_up ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
SF_cut_up_cons_0 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), x < fst h -> SF_cut_up (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (x, Rmax (fst h) x) (SF_cons h ptd)
SF_cut_down_cons_1 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), fst h <= x < SF_h ptd -> SF_cut_down (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_cons (fst h, Rmin (snd h) x) (SF_nil x)
SF_cut_down_cons_0 : forall (h : R * R) (ptd : SF_seq) (x : R), x < fst h -> SF_cut_down (SF_cons h ptd) x = SF_nil x
seq_cut_up = fix seq_cut_up (s : seq (R * R)) (x : R) {struct s} : seq (R * R) := match s with | [::] => [:: (x, x)] | h :: t => if Rle_dec (fst h) x then seq_cut_up t x else [:: (x, x), (fst h, Rmax (snd h) x) & t] end : seq (R * R) -> R -> seq (R * R) Argument scopes are [seq_scope R_scope]
seq_cut_down = fix seq_cut_down (s : seq (R * R)) (x : R) {struct s} : seq (R * R) := match s with | [::] => [:: (x, x)] | h :: t => if Rle_dec (fst h) x then h :: seq_cut_down t x else [:: (x, Rmin (snd h) x)] end : seq (R * R) -> R -> seq (R * R) Argument scopes are [seq_scope R_scope]
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
SF_map_cons : forall (f : ?T -> ?T0) (h0 : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_map f (SF_cons h0 s) = SF_cons (fst h0, f (snd h0)) (SF_map f s) where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type] ?T0 : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
ptd_cons : forall (h : R * R) (s : SF_seq), pointed_subdiv (SF_cons h s) -> pointed_subdiv s
SF_cut_down_h : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), SF_h s <= x -> SF_h (SF_cut_down s x) = SF_h s
SF_cons_cat : forall (x0 : R * ?T) (x1 y : SF_seq), SF_cons x0 (SF_cat x1 y) = SF_cat (SF_cons x0 x1) y where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_lx_cons : forall (h0 : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_cons h0 s) = fst h0 :: SF_lx s where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_cons_rcons : forall (h0 : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq) (l : R * ?T), SF_cons h0 (SF_rcons s l) = SF_rcons (SF_cons h0 s) l where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_cut_up_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) < eps
SF_cut_down_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)) < eps
SF_cut_down = fun (sf : SF_seq) (x : R) => let s := seq_cut_down ((SF_h sf, SF_h sf) :: SF_t sf) x in {| SF_h := fst (head (SF_h sf, SF_h sf) s); SF_t := behead s |} : SF_seq -> R -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [_ R_scope]
SF_cut_down_pointed : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), SF_h s <= x -> pointed_subdiv s -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cut_down s x)
SF_cut_up_pointed : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), SF_h s <= x -> pointed_subdiv s -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cut_up s x)
belast = fun (T : Type) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => [::] | h :: s0 => seq.belast h s0 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
filterlim_comp_2 : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V) (h0 : ?U -> ?V -> ?W), filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?H -> filterlim (fun x0 : ?U * ?V => h0 (fst x0) (snd x0)) (filter_prod ?G ?H) ?I ->...-> Prop] ?FF : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Filter ?F]
filterlimi_comp_2 : forall (f : ?T -> ?U) (g : ?T -> ?V) (h0 : ?U -> ?V -> ?W -> Prop), filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim g ?F ?H -> filterlimi (fun x0 : ?U * ?V => h0 (fst x0) (snd x0)) (filter_prod ?G ?H) ?I ->...-> Prop] ?FF : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Filter ?F]
SF_rev_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (t : R * ?T), SF_rev (SF_rcons s t) = SF_cons t (SF_rev s) where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
Rmax_l : forall x y : R, x <= Rmax x y
SF_map = fun (T T0 : Type) (f : T -> T0) (s : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := SF_h s; SF_t := [seq (fst x, f (snd x)) | x <- SF_t s] |} : forall T T0 : Type, (T -> T0) -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Arguments T, T0 are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope _]
Rmax_r : forall x y : R, y <= Rmax x y
last_unzip1 : forall (x0 : ?S) (y0 : ?T) (s : seq (?S * ?T)), last x0 (unzip1 s) = fst (last (x0, y0) s) where ?S : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type] ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
prod_plus = fun (U V : AbelianGroup) (x y : U * V) => (plus (fst x) (fst y), plus (snd x) (snd y)) : forall U V : AbelianGroup, U * V -> U * V -> U * V Arguments U, V are implicit and maximally inserted
SF_map_rcons : forall (f : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq) (h0 : R * ?T), SF_map f (SF_rcons s h0) = SF_rcons (SF_map f s) (fst h0, f (snd h0)) where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type] ?T0 : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_last_lx : forall (x0 : ?T) (s : SF_seq), fst (SF_last x0 s) = last 0 (SF_lx s) where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_cut_up_h : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), SF_h (SF_cut_up s x) = x
SF_size_cons : forall (h0 : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_size (SF_cons h0 s) = S (SF_size s) where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
ptd_sort' : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> sorted Rle (SF_ly ptd)
locally_2d = fun (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R) => exists delta : posreal, forall u v : R, Rabs (u - x) < delta -> Rabs (v - y) < delta -> P u v : (R -> R -> Prop) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
SF_rev_cons : forall (h0 : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_rev (SF_cons h0 s) = SF_rcons (SF_rev s) h0 where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_ly_cons : forall (h0 : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_ly (SF_cons h0 s) = snd h0 :: SF_ly s where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_cons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h0 : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), P (SF_cons h0 s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_cons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h0 : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), P s -> P (SF_cons h0 s)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [h : R * R ptd : SF_seq x : R |- Type]
SF_cat = fun (T : Type) (x y : SF_seq) => {| SF_h := SF_h x; SF_t := SF_t x ++ SF_t y |} : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
injective_projections : forall (A B : Type) (p1 p2 : A * B), fst p1 = fst p2 -> snd p1 = snd p2 -> p1 = p2
locally_2d_locally : forall (P : R -> R -> Prop) (x y : R), locally_2d P x y < -> locally (x, y) (fun z : prod_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace R_UniformSpace => P (fst z) (snd z))
prod_ball = fun (U V : UniformSpace) (x : U * V) (eps : R) (y : U * V) => ball (fst x) eps (fst y) /\ ball (snd x) eps (snd y) : forall U V : UniformSpace, U * V -> R -> U * V -> Prop Arguments U, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ R_scope _]

```coq
intros h ptd x H.
unfold SF_cut_up. simpl.
unfold seq_cut_up. simpl.
destruct h as [h1 h2].
destruct ptd as [ptd1 ptd2].
unfold fst, snd.
destruct H as [H1 H2].
destruct (Rle_dec h1 x) as [case_le | case_gt].
- unfold SF_cut_up. simpl.
  rewrite -> case_le. reflexivity.
- unfold SF_cut_up. simpl.
  rewrite -> case_gt. reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: intros h ptd x H. unfold SF_cut_up. simpl. unfold seq_cut_up. simpl. destruct h as [h1 h2]. destruct ptd as [ptd1 ptd2]. unfold fst, snd. destruct H as [H1 H2]. destruct (Rle_dec h1 x) as [case_le | case_gt]. - unfold SF_cut_up. simpl. rewrite -> case_le. reflexivity. - unfold SF_cut_up. simpl. rewrite -> case_gt. reflexivity.
